attributes.action: Allow members of the armed forces deployed operationally abroad to be exempt from paying income tax.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned believe that it is an outrage to expect British service personnel to risk their lives for the safety and security of ours and other nations in increasingly difficult circumstances world wide and still expect them to pay tax on the income they earn whilst doing this. It would be of great benefit to these personnel if they were to be exempt from paying income tax while they are serving in operational theatres outside of the UK.
